subject: Hockey, Ice
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: From its inception in 1925 as the Border Cities Arena, Windsor Arena has been in constant use for hockey, hosting pickup games, youth leagues, junior hockey and even the N.H.L.
snippet: From its inception in 1925 as the Border Cities Arena, Windsor Arena has been in constant use for hockey, hosting pickup games, youth leagues, junior hockey and even the N.H.L.
